credit_line: Gift of W. and J. Sloane
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed with engraved and relief rollers on plain weave and glazed
description: Continuous vertical columns with urns of flowers and scrolls with mermaids printed in yellow and red, on a ground of ivy in red outlined in white on an olive ground. An engraved roller was used for the red, and relief rollers for the yellow and olive.
name: Textile
